about.title: About Me
about.description1: I am a dedicated Frontend Developer with 4+ years of experience, specializing in building modern web applications. With a unique blend of technical expertise and digital marketing background, I bring a holistic approach to web development.
about.description2: I maintain a technology blog and create educational content, sharing my knowledge with the tech community. My experience as a Telegram Sales and Advertising Manager has enhanced my ability to create user-centric solutions.
